document_Description.description: Description of the data in the STIX document

information_source_description.description: The description of the source of the report

package_intents.description: Collection of one or more package intents for the document

package_intent.description: The type of indicator data in the document

package_intent_vocab.description: The vocabulary for the type of indicator data in the document

version.description: The STIX version of the document

handling.description: Collection of one or more handling instructions for the document

handling_controlledstructure.description: The control level for the TLP marking

handling_markingstructures.description: Collection of one or more handling markings for the document

handling_markingstructures_color.description: The TLP color for the document

handling_markingstructures_xsitype.description: The XSI type for the marking structure

handling_markingstructures_statement.description: The simple marking statement for the document

handling_markingstructures_TOU.description: The Terms of Use for the document

profiles.description: Collection of one or more profiles for the document

indicator_cybox_version.description: The cybox version for the indicator data in the row

indicator_types.description: Collection of one or more indicator types for the indicator set

indicator_type_vocab.description: The vocabulary for the type of indicator data in the row

observable_sighting_count.description: The observable sighting_count field specifies how many different identical instances of the Observable may have been seen/sighted.

observable_object_category.description: The category of the indicator object

observable_object_type.description: The type of the indicator object

observable_object_xsitype.description: The schema type of the indicator object

observable_object_addressvalue_value.description: The value of the IP address object

observable_object_addressvalue_condition.description: The match condition for the IP address object

observable_object_properties_is_spoofed.description: Specifies whether the address is forged to conceal its identity or true source

observable_object_filename_condition.description: The match condition for the filename object

observable_object_filepath_condition.description: The match condition for the filepath object

observable_object_sizeinbytes_value.description: The file size in bytes to match

observable_object_sizeinbytes_condition.description: The match condition for the file size in bytes object

observable_object_sizeinbytes_applycondi.description: The match condition for the file size in bytes object if there are multiple values

observable_object_value_value.description: The value of the DNS object

observable_object_value_condition.description: The match condition for the DNS object

observable_object_header_sender_xsitype.description: The schema type of the sender object

observable_object_header_sender_category.description: The category of the sender object

observable_object_header_sender_addressv.description: The value of the sender address object
The match condition for the sender address object

observable_object_header_sender_custompr.description: Collection of one or more indicators for the indicator set
True if the sender address was spoofed
True if the sender address was spoofed

observable_object_header_subject_value.description: The value of the header subject object

observable_object_header_subject_conditi.description: The match condition for the header subject object

observable_object_header_subject_applyco.description: The match condition for the email subject object if there are multiple values

observable_object_header_xmailer_value.description: The value of the header x-mailer object

observable_object_header_xmailer_conditi.description: The match condition for the header x-mailer object

observable_object_header_messageid_value.description: The value of the header message-id object

observable_object_header_messageid_condi.description: The match condition for the header message-id object

observable_object_hashes.description: Collection of one or more file hashes for the indicator set

observable_object_hashes_type_value.description: The type of the hash of the file

observable_object_hashes_type_condition.description: The match condition for the type of the hash of the file

observable_object_hashes_simplehash_valu.description: The type of the hash of the file

observable_object_hashes_simplehash_cond.description: The match condition for the type of the hash of the file

observable_object_hashes_fuzzyhash_value.description: The type of the hash of the file

observable_object_hashes_fuzzyhash_condi.description: The match condition for the type of the hash of the file

observable_object_reghive_value.description: The value of the registry hive object

observable_object_reghive_condition.description: The match condition for the registry hive object

observable_object_regkey_condition.description: The match condition for the registry key object

observable_object_properties_values.description: Collection of one or more registry keys for the indicator set

observable_object_regkey_subkey_name_con.description: The registry subkey object name match condition

observable_object_regkey_subkey_data_con.description: The registry subkey object data match condition

observable_object_mutexname_value.description: The value of the mutex name object

observable_object_mutexname_condition.description: The match condition for the mutex name object

observable_object_urllabel_value.description: The value of the url_label object

observable_object_urllabel_condition.description: The match condition for the url_label object

observable_object_urllabel_pattern_type.description: The pattern type for the url_label object

observable_object_relationship.description: The value of the relationship object

observable_object_http_request.description: Collection of one or more http request or response headers for the indicator set

observable_object_http_client_request_us.description: The value of the user agent header object in the http client request
The match condition for the user agent header object in the http client request

observable_object_links.description: Collection of one or more attachment references for the indicator set

observable_object_links_reference.description: Reference to another STIX object that contains URL information, currently not processed by Flexible Transform

observable_object_attachments.description: Collection of one or more attachment references for the indicator set

observable_object_attachments_reference.description: Reference to another STIX object that contains URL information, currently not processed by Flexible Transform

observable_object_rawartifact.description: Reference to another STIX object that contains URL information, currently not processed by Flexible Transform

observable_object_contenttype.description: The content type of the indicator object

observable_object_suspectedmalicious.description: True if artifact is suspected malicious

observable_object_packaging.description: Collection of one or more artifact packaging details

observable_object_packaging_algorithm.description: The algorithm used to encode the artifact

observable_object_packaging_packagingtyp.description: The match condition for the user agent header object in the http client request

observable_keywords.description: Key words related to this observable

observable_keywords_keyword.description: Key word related to the observable

killchain_phases.description: Collection of one or more kill chains for the indicator set

sightings_sightings.description: Collection of one or more sightings for the indicator set

sightings_timestamp.description: The time of the last sighting

sightings_timestamp_precision.description: The precision of the timestamp of sighting

related_objects.description: Collection of one or more related indicator objects

observable_relatedobject_xsitype.description: The schema type of the indicator object

observable_relatedobject_layer4_protocol.description: The value of the DNS object

observable_relatedobject_value.description: The value of the DNS object

observable_relatedobject_condition.description: The match condition for the related object

suggested_coas.description: Collection of one or more suggested courses of action objects

suggested_coas_scope.description: The scope of the course of action

suggested_coas_coa_description.description: The description of the course of action

suggested_coas_coa_stage.description: The stage for the course of action

suggested_coas_coa_type.description: The course of action to be taken

observable_cost.description: <Temporary> Estimated cost for applying this indicator (taken from COA)

observable_efficacy.description: <Temporary> Effectiveness of this indicator in achieving Objective (taken from COA)
